title: Technical Leader and Product Strategist for SAAS
subtitle: JoYnt: Chicago, IL
description: I led the development of a dispensary e-commerce, kiosk, and TV menu platform, driving technical and product strategy using a modern tech stack. My leadership and strategic integrations positioned JoYnt as an industry leader and fueled ongoing growth and innovation.

title: Product Architect (Contract)
subtitle: SKL Trading: London, UK
description: Rewrote market making platform with a modular design using ZeroMQ and Node TS. Implemented cryptocurency exchange connectivity and integrated Prometheus & Grafana metrics for improved insights. Led the development of a client UI with Redwood JS for liquidity management and analytics.

title: Technology Consultant (Contract)
subtitle: Cannabis Workforce Initiative: NY
description: Implemented a large language model integration using the OpenAI Assistant API. Led the design and development of the Career Coach system delivered as a PHP wordpress plugin.

title: President & Business Strategist
subtitle: Perception Farms: Chicago, IL
description: I led the growth of a vertically integrated cannabis business, managing product development, compliance, and operations. I drove business growth through strategic partnerships, while ensuring regulatory compliance and operational efficiency.

title: Director, Software Engineering
subtitle: Epsilon - Conversant: Chicago, IL
description: As Managing Director of the Ad Server API Team, I led the design, development, testing, and deployment of server-side and client-side components for Conversant's RTB, CRM, and DMP platforms, ensuring scalability across global data centers.

title: Chief Architect
subtitle: Nuvatek: Chicago, IL
description: As Chief Architect and Lead Developer, I optimized and extended high-frequency trading systems using Java, Python, and C++. I also led the design and deployment of a custom market analytics suite and integrated disparate systems using RabbitMQ. Additionally, I  improved low-latency message deduplication software.

title: Director of Software Development & Financial Engineering
subtitle: INTL FCStone Inc: Chicago, IL
description: I led the development of transaction data routing, monitoring, reconciliation, and reporting solutions using RabbitMQ, MongoDB, and C#. I also produced extensive technical and business documentation, including API references and business case proposals, to support internal and external stakeholders. I oversaw all software development and financial engineering for HFT solutions at Hanley Group Capital for 3 years prior to being acquired by INTL FCStone.
